AccountSettings.Name: Wizzlethorpe Labs Account
AccountSettings.Label: Manage Account
AccountSettings.Hint: Link your Wizzlethorpe Labs account to access premium features and server-side generation.

UseServerMode.Name: Use Server-Side Generation
UseServerMode.Hint: When enabled, use Wizzlethorpe Labs servers for generation (requires Alchemist+ subscription). When disabled, always use your own API key.

OpenAIApiKey.Name: OpenAI API Key
OpenAIApiKey.Hint: Your OpenAI API key for BYOK mode. Get one at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys. Not required if using server-side generation.

ImageModel.Name: Image Model
ImageModel.Hint: Which OpenAI image model to use. Mini is faster and cheaper, Standard is higher quality.

SaveFolder.Name: Image Save Folder
SaveFolder.Hint: Folder name where generated images will be saved (default: quickbrush-images)

Dialog.Title: Generate Image with Quickbrush
Dialog.DescriptionPlaceholder: Long-form text (e.g., journal entry, character background). May contain irrelevant details - we'll focus on physical description.
Dialog.PromptPlaceholder: e.g., 'wearing a red cloak', 'in a defensive stance', 'at sunset'
Dialog.Type: What do you want to paint?

Notifications.NoApiKey: Please set your OpenAI API key in module settings or link your Wizzlethorpe Labs account
Notifications.Generating: Generating image with Quickbrush. We'll notify you when it's ready!

Gallery.Title: Quickbrush Gallery
Gallery.Description: This journal contains all images generated with Quickbrush.
Gallery.EntryTemplate:
{type} - {date}

Description: {description}

Quality: {quality} | Aspect Ratio: {aspectRatio}

ShowEffects.Name: Show Effects to Players
ShowEffects.Hint: When enabled, players can see cocktail effect descriptions. When disabled, only the GM sees effects.

Notifications.NeedSubscription: Full cocktail menu requires an Apprentice subscription or higher
